subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The next Tour de France will start in Rotterdam, the next Giro d'Italia will start in Amsterdam and the next Vuelta a España will start Saturday in Assen, the capital of the Dutch province of Drenth.
snippet: The next Tour de France will start in Rotterdam, the next Giro d'Italia will start in Amsterdam and the next Vuelta a España will start Saturday in Assen, the capital of the Dutch province of Drenth.
